item.title: Open Source Publishing
item.description: Shows what can be done in a short period of time. I didn’t start building any of this till the beginning of this year. It’s true that it’s a ton of work to do what I do, but you could use this concept for just one topic instead of 100 and build a valuable resource in a few days! I will publish monthly stats, though it won’t always be the same, and if you have any requests, pop up in the issues.
